tags.description: tag key as attribute key and tag value as attribute value

cluster.description: name of cluster of the service

loadbalanced.description: Whether the service is load-balanced or not. Only loadbalanced services have DNS mapping

resources.description: List of resources to be controlled by the schedule

details.description: Details of time schedule by which the resource should be controlled

StaticScheduleResource.description: Details of an independent resource that can be controlled by a schedule

id.description: ID of the resource to be controlled by schedule. For AutoStopping rule, this would be the ID of the rule

type.description: Type of the resource to be controlled

OccurrenceSchedule.description: Details of time schedule by which the resource should be controlled

uptime.description: Defines the uptime schedule for the specified resources. Static schedule will ensure resource is up during this schedule

downtime.description: Defines the downtime schedule for the specified resources. Static schedule will ensure resource is down during this schedule

timezone.description: Time zone in which the schedule should be applied

TimeSchedule.description: Specifies the occurrence schedule. Occurrence schedule can either be specified as period or as days

period.description: For schedules that uses an exact time period

days.description: For specifying a recurring schedule in terms of week days
Days of week on which the schedule should be executed

start_time.description: Starting time of schedule on the selected days

end_time.description: Ending time of schedule on the selected days
